title: Revolution frequency of particle in magnetic field

content.question: A negatively charged particle in a uniform magnetic field B moves in a circular path of radius r, as shown above. Which of the following graphs best depicts how the frequency of revolution ùëì of the particle depends on the radius r ?

choices.label: Choice A is a graph with f on the vertical axis and r on the horizontal axis. Choice A is a horizontal line.
Choice B is a graph with f on the vertical axis and r on the horizontal axis. Choice B is a curve that is decreasing and concave up.
Choice C is a graph with f on the vertical axis and r on the horizontal axis. Choice C is a line that is linearly increasing.
Choice D is a graph with f on the vertical axis and r on the horizontal axis. Choice D is a line that is linearly decreasing.
Choice E is a graph with f on the vertical axis and r on the horizontal axis. Choice E is a curve that is increasing and concave up.

content.answer: Choice A is a graph with f on the vertical axis and r on the horizontal axis. Choice A is a horizontal line.
